transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Oh, hi sir, how are you?
Executive: Parvez bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Rahul ji baat kar rahe hai?
Executive: Nahi, bataiye.
Customer: Okay. Aapka na ek, mujhe call kiya tha aapne kal ke date me.
Executive: Due drop se. Main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Achcha. Aap na sir kal phone karna, jo handle karte hai wo aaj zara jaldi chale gaye.
Executive: Chutti pe?
Customer: Chutti pe chale gaye.
Executive: Ye abhi lunch me chale gaye hai. To aap mujhe kal, uh, kal isi number pe aap phone kar lena 10-11 baje.
Customer: Achcha wo chale gaye, wo to keh rahe the ki 3 baje connect karne ke liye.
Executive: Der se baat hui thi to.
Customer: Kab baat hui thi aapki?
Executive: Der se baat hui thi.
Customer: 3 baje connect karne ke liye kaha tha unhone.
Executive: Jo baat karte hai na wo chale gaye abhi chutti pe. Wo kal 11 baje aap phone kar lena.
Customer: Wo Deepanshu hoga, wo utha lega.
Executive: Achcha theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ek second.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called back regarding a previous query.
- Requested person (Rahul/Deepanshu) was unavailable.


Resolution:

- Informed that the concerned person had left early.
- Advised to call back the next day at 10-11 AM.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Executive to call back the next day between 10-11 AM to speak with Deepanshu.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- callback, follow-up, unavailability of contact person
